body:
What can I say besides, "Wow!"  This is very exciting.  I'm glad that
you felt inspired to work on this, as this seems like a whole new
direction and potential for our little community.  I encourage people
to try it out, do comparisons, validations, etc.  I've thought many
times of rewriting Radiance over the years, and never managed to find
the funds or free time even to begin.  Thanks, Carsten!!

-Greg

"Lookout!  RADZILLA is coming!"
